metadata.title: CVE-2018-5309 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In PoDoFo 0.9.5, there is an integer overflow in thePdfObjectStreamParserObject::ReadObjectsFromStream function(base/PdfObjectStreamParserObject.cpp). Remote attackers could leveragethis vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
